text: wma yastawi albhran: hdha eadhb shadid aledhwbt, sahl mrwrh fi alhlq yzyl aletsh, whdha milh shadid almlwht, wamin kuli min albahrayn takulun smkana tryana shhy alttaem, watastakhrijun zynt hi alluwlu walmarjan talbaswnha, wataraa alsufun fih shaqat almyah; litabtaghuu min fadlih min altijarat wghyrha. wafi hdha dlalt ealaa qudrat allah wwhdanyth; walaealakum tashkurun lilah ealaa hadhih alnaeam alty 'aneam biha elykm
